price: Et il en est parmi eux qui te regardent. Est-ce toi qui peux guider les aveugles, même s’ils ne voient pas ?
arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَنظُرُ إِلَيۡكَۚ أَفَأَنتَ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man yanẓuru ilayka afa-anta tahdī al-ʿum'ya walaw kānū lā yub'ṣirūna
